# Bold Reports
- [ ] [Bold Reports](https://www.boldreports.com/)
- [ ] [Bold Reports: Simplify Your Reporting Process](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rQiHIwtH_SM&t=51s&loop=0)
- [ ] [embedded-reporting installation](https://www.boldreports.com/embedded-reporting/videos/installation)
- [ ] [Designer Guide / Tablix](https://help.boldreports.com/enterprise-reporting/designer-guide/report-designer/report-items/tablix/)
- [ ] [Add Grouping and Totals](https://help.boldreports.com/enterprise-reporting/designer-guide/report-designer/report-items/tablix/add-grouping-and-totals-in-tablix-design/#add-grouping-and-totals)
- [ ] [Insert or Delete a Row Group](https://help.boldreports.com/enterprise-reporting/designer-guide/report-designer/report-items/tablix/insert-or-delete-a-row-group-ssrs/#insert-or-delete-a-row-group)
- [ ] [Export report](https://help.boldreports.com/embedded-reporting/javascript-reporting/report-viewer/export-report/#export-report)
- [ ] [repeat-headers-on-each-page-in-ssrs](https://help.boldreports.com/enterprise-reporting/designer-guide/report-designer/report-items/tablix/repeat-headers-on-each-page-in-ssrs/)

# Q&A
1. Can you display how to set up page break and what the difference is between that setting? (start,end,startandend,between)
2. My report is group by id and need to break every id into one sheet in excel. Maybe one id have more than one page, so that have to break into multiple sheet?
3. After set up for page break so that I can break excel into multiple sheet?
4. 
# 安裝
## IDE
- Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 or later
- Internet Information Services (IIS) 7.0+
- VSCode

## 安裝 Client 端 桌面端報表設計器應用程式
下載 [BoldReports_StandaloneReportDesigner](https://www.boldreports.com/account/downloads)
安裝 BoldReports_StandaloneReportDesigner.exe
 
# 什麼是嵌入式報告 ( Embedded Reporting )
- 嵌入式報告允許你將 Microsoft RDL 報告功能整合到自己的軟體應用程序中 
( Embedded Reporting allows you to incorporate Microsoft RDL reporting functionality within your own software application. )

# 什麼是 Bold Reports 嵌入式報告 ( Bold Reports Embedded Reporting )
- Syncfusion 的 Bold Reports Embedded Reporting 是一個強大的軟體開發套件，用於在你的軟體應用程序中嵌入商業智能報告工具
( Bold Reports Embedded Reporting by Syncfusion is a powerfuk SDK for embedding bussiness intelligence reporting tools in your software applictions. )

- 你的應用程序成為滿足所有客戶需求的單一訪問點
( Your applications becomes a single of point access for all your clients' needs. )

# 嵌入是如何運作的
- 你的報告可能位於 Bold Report Server、SSRS、任何外部服務器或您的應用程序中。你的應用程序的客戶端可以使用 REST API 或 Bold Reports Web API 服務直接在你的應用程序中創建、編輯或查看報告
( Your reports may reside on the Bold Report Server, SSRS, any external server, or within your application.Clients to your applications can create, edit, or view the reports directly in your appliction using REST APIs or the Bold Reports web API service. )

```diagram

```


# 嵌入式報告包含哪些
## 報表伺服器 Report Server：在 Web 瀏覽器中運行的 SaaS 應用程序
- 一個企業報告管理系統，用於創建和管理用戶、計劃和報告，然後與利益相關者共享它們以進行協作
- [server](https://on-premise-demo.boldreports.com/reporting/site/site1/reports?view=all)

## 報表設計器 Report Designer：支援所有網頁應用程序
- 讓你可以在網頁應用程序中直接創建與編輯報表、資料集、多種型態的資料來源
- 報告設計器是一個基於網絡的所見即所得報告工具，用於創建和編輯 RDL 和 RDLC 報告
- 支援平台：JS、Angular、React、.NET Core、.NET MVC、.NET Web、UWP、WPF、Blazor
- [designer](http://localhost:14356/demos/javascript/report-designer/)

![boldreports report designer.png](http://192.168.25.60:8000/files/file_storage/5a3c3a31.png)

- **serviceUrl**：指定報告 Web API 服務 URL

## 報表查看器 Report Viewer：支援網頁及桌面應用程序
- 透過你的應用程序去查看已經存在的報表
- 報告查看器是一個報告控制項，它使 Web 和桌面應用程序能夠查看 SSRS RDL 和 RDLC 報告並匯出
- 支援平台：JS、Angular、React、.NET Core、.NET MVC、.NET Web、UWP、WPF、Blazor 
- [viewer](https://demos.boldreports.com/javascript/#/report-viewer/product-line-sales)

![boldreports report viewer.png](http://192.168.25.60:8000/files/file_storage/ca104eab.png)

- **reportPath**：設定報表路徑
- **reportServiceUrl**：指定報告 Web API 服務 URL

## 報表編輯器 Report Writer：跨平台的 .NET 函式庫
- 為一個 C# 函式庫可以讓你寫程式去創建與匯出 SSRS RDL 與 RDLC 報告
- 支援平台： .NET Core、.NET MVC、.NET Web、UWP、WPF
- 匯出格式：PDF、Excel、CSV、Word、PowerPoint、 HTML

# 兩種嵌入方式
## 組件嵌入 Component embedding (建議使用)
- 將報表查看器或報表設計器組件嵌入到應用程序中
- 可連結的報表形式：
1. Bold Reports Report Server

```diagram

```

2. SQL Server Reporting Services ( SSRS ) 或其他外部 server

```diagram

```

3. 任何應用程序

```diagram

```

## iFrame 嵌入 iFrame embedding 
- 用嵌入程式碼的方式直接嵌入報表到 app

# 嵌入式報告的優勢
- 可以崁入報表工具到你的商業應用程序並呈顯
- Pixel-perfect，可列印式報表
- 崁入 RDL 報表
- 崁入到桌面及網頁應用程序
- 對於從 SSRS 移轉有較低的學習曲線
- 移轉 RDL 檔案而不做任何修改

# 嵌入式報告的功能
## 強大的 SDK

|**類型**|**SDK**|
|:-------:|:----------------:|
|桌面應用程序|UWP、WPF|
|服務器端技術|.NET Core、.NET MVC、.NET Web|
|JS 技術|JS、Angular、React|
|用戶端框架|Blazor|

## SDK 瀏覽器 ( SDK explorer )
- SDK 設置頁提供一個控制板可以進入報表工具的範例及示例
- 可以一開始觀看範例去探索 SDK 功能

## 對開發者友好的 APIs
- 可以控制 UI 元素 (工具欄、參數塊、頁面、對話框)，與報表工具的行為
- 透過大量對開發者友好的 APIs 可提供給使用者最佳體驗

## 客製的外觀
- 素材 Material
- Bootstrap
- Office 365
- 高對比度 High Contrast 1 
- 高對比度 High Contrast 2 
- 全域與特定範圍設定

## 豐富的視覺化體驗
- 35+ 個小工具提供豐富的視覺化體驗
- 小工具包含：長條圖( bar charts )、柱狀圖( column charts )、圓餅圖( pie charts )、Tablix、矩陣( matrix )、指標( indicators )、儀表( gauges )、條碼( barcodes )

## 豐富的使用者介面
- SDK 提供豐富且對開發者友好的介面去設計、查看、匯出報表
- 所見即所得的設計體驗是像素等級的

## 多元的資料來源
- 內建的資料來源：MSSQL、Microsoft SQL Azure、Oracle、OLEDB、ODBC、Web API、OData、JSON、XML
- 商業物件資料來源：JSON
- 自定義數據處理擴充：SASS、MySQL、PostgreSQL

## 列印與匯出
- 工具列的列印與匯出選項
- 支援類型：PDF、Excel、CSV、Word、PowerPoint、XML、 HTML

# 報表結構 ( Report Structure )

```diagram

```

## 資料來源 ( Data Source )
- 資料來源掌握資料庫連線設定
- 資料庫連線設定：資料來源類型、連線資訊、需使用的憑證

### 崁入式資料來源 ( Embedded data source )
- 在一個報表建立的崁入式資料來源只能被這個報表使用

### 共享式資料來源 ( Embedded data source )
- 在報表伺服器建立的共享式資料來源可以被多個報表使用
 
## 資料集 ( Data Set )
- 資料集是資料來源一段簡單的查詢，去取得特定報表的資料

### 崁入式資料集 ( Embedded data set )
- 在一個報表建立的崁入式資料集只能被這個報表使用

### 共享式資料集 ( Embedded data set )
- 在報表伺服器建立的共享式資料集可以被多個報表使用


# 報表設計 ( Report Design )
## schema
1. **庫存明細表**( stock_detail )、**庫別表**( warehouse )：
- stock_detail / warehouse：多對多關係
2. **公司表**( company )、**產品表**( product )、**附產品表**( byproduct )、**憑證表**( certificate )、**憑證明細表**( certificate_detail )：
- certificate_detail / product：一對多關係
- certificate_detail / byproduct：一對多關係
- certificate / certificate_detail：多對多關係
- certificate / company：一對多關係

```schema
// This is your Prisma schema file,
// learn more about it in the docs: https://pris.ly/d/prisma-schema

generator client {
  provider = "prisma-client-js"
}

datasource db {
  provider = "sqlite"
  url      = env("DATABASE_URL")
}

model stock_detail {
  stock_id    String      @id @default("00000000000000")
  stock_name  String      @default("")
  spec        String      @default("")
  unit        String      @default("")
  unit_detail String      @default("")
  warehouses  warehouse[]
}

model warehouse {
  warehouse_id   Int            @id @default(autoincrement())
  warehouse_name String         @default("")
  quantity       Int            @default(0)
  stocks         stock_detail[]
}

model company {
  company_id   String        @id @default("00000000")
  company_name String        @default("")
  certificate  certificate[]
}

model certificate {
  certificate_id     String               @id @default("0000000000")
  company            company              @relation(fields: [company_id], references: [company_id])
  datetime           String               @default("1970-01-01 00:00:00")
  serial             String               @default("")
  serial_detail      String               @default("")
  company_id         String
  certificate_detail certificate_detail[]
}

model product {
  product_id         String               @id @default("00000000")
  product_name       String               @default("")
  unit               String               @default("")
  unit_price         Float                @default(0.00)
  certificate_detail certificate_detail[]
}

model byproduct {
  byproduct_id       String               @id @default("00000000")
  byproduct_name     String               @default("")
  unit               String               @default("")
  unit_price         Float                @default(0.00)
  certificate_detail certificate_detail[]
}

model certificate_detail {
  certificate_detail_id Int           @id @default(autoincrement())
  certificate_id        String        @default("0000000000")
  product               product       @relation(fields: [product_id], references: [product_id])
  byproduct             byproduct?    @relation(fields: [byproduct_id], references: [byproduct_id])
  product_id            String
  byproduct_id          String?
  product_quantity      Int           @default(0)
  byproduct_quantity    Int?
  certificate           certificate[]
}

```
## 明細類報表
> 主要使用 table：
> - 庫存明細表( stock_detail )
> - 庫別表( warehouse )

### data sql
```sql
-- stock_detail
INSERT INTO "main"."stock_detail" ("stock_id", "stock_name", "spec", "unit", "unit_detail") VALUES ('84203009403001', '梁山泊 吟釀 300ml', 'GA 300ml', '瓶', '');
INSERT INTO "main"."stock_detail" ("stock_id", "stock_name", "spec", "unit", "unit_detail") VALUES ('84203009406001', '津輕海峽 本格燒酎 300ml', 'GA 300ml', '瓶', '');
INSERT INTO "main"."stock_detail" ("stock_id", "stock_name", "spec", "unit", "unit_detail") VALUES ('84207009102000', '老酋長Dalmore1995原酒n.9430', 'GA 700ml/禮盒', '瓶', '');
INSERT INTO "main"."stock_detail" ("stock_id", "stock_name", "spec", "unit", "unit_detail") VALUES ('84207009103002', '馬諦氏精釀禮盒', 'GA 700ml/禮盒', '盒', '');

-- warehouse
INSERT INTO "main"."warehouse" ("warehouse_id", "warehouse_name", "quantity") VALUES ('1', '贈品倉', '4');
INSERT INTO "main"."warehouse" ("warehouse_id", "warehouse_name", "quantity") VALUES ('2', '23樓倉庫', '5');
INSERT INTO "main"."warehouse" ("warehouse_id", "warehouse_name", "quantity") VALUES ('3', '業務北辦', '0');

-- _stock_detailTowarehouse
INSERT INTO "main"."_stock_detailTowarehouse" ("A", "B") VALUES ('84203009403001', '1');
INSERT INTO "main"."_stock_detailTowarehouse" ("A", "B") VALUES ('84203009403001', '2');
INSERT INTO "main"."_stock_detailTowarehouse" ("A", "B") VALUES ('84203009406001', '3');
INSERT INTO "main"."_stock_detailTowarehouse" ("A", "B") VALUES ('84207009102000', '1');
INSERT INTO "main"."_stock_detailTowarehouse" ("A", "B") VALUES ('84207009103002', '2');
INSERT INTO "main"."_stock_detailTowarehouse" ("A", "B") VALUES ('84207009102000', '3');
```


### 新增 Data Source：NEW DATASOURCE ➔ Web API ➔ NEW CONNECTION
- Name： report_api
- URL： http://192.168.25.180:10010/api/public/stock/findAll
- Method： GET

![boldreports report designer create a data source.png](http://192.168.25.60:8000/files/file_storage/6a59a0a7.png)

### 新增 Data Set：NEW DATA ➔ Existing Data Source ➔ Connect DataSource 
- 將左側出現的 api res 拉至右側

![boldreports report designer create a data set.png](http://192.168.25.60:8000/files/file_storage/74ad8335.png)

- api 資料格式

```json
{
    "code": "00",
    "dateTime": {
        "tw_date": "2023/01/30",
        "tw_time": "13:59:19",
        "tw_day": "(一)"
    },
    "data": [
        {
            "stock_id": "84203009403001",
            "stock_name": "梁山泊 吟釀 300ml",
            "spec": "GA 300ml",
            "unit": "瓶",
            "unit_detail": "",
            "warehouses": [
                {
                    "warehouse_id": 1,
                    "warehouse_name": "贈品倉",
                    "quantity": 4
                },
                {
                    "warehouse_id": 2,
                    "warehouse_name": "23樓倉庫",
                    "quantity": 5
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "stock_id": "84203009406001",
            "stock_name": "津輕海峽 本格燒酎 300ml",
            "spec": "GA 300ml",
            "unit": "瓶",
            "unit_detail": "",
            "warehouses": [
                {
                    "warehouse_id": 3,
                    "warehouse_name": "業務北辦",
                    "quantity": 0
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "stock_id": "84207009102000",
            "stock_name": "老酋長Dalmore1995原酒n.9430",
            "spec": "GA 700ml/禮盒",
            "unit": "瓶",
            "unit_detail": "",
            "warehouses": [
                {
                    "warehouse_id": 1,
                    "warehouse_name": "贈品倉",
                    "quantity": 4
                },
                {
                    "warehouse_id": 2,
                    "warehouse_name": "23樓倉庫",
                    "quantity": 5
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "stock_id": "84207009103002",
            "stock_name": "馬諦氏精釀禮盒",
            "spec": "GA 700ml/禮盒",
            "unit": "盒",
            "unit_detail": "",
            "warehouses": [
                {
                    "warehouse_id": 3,
                    "warehouse_name": "業務北辦",
                    "quantity": 0
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
```

### 報表設計步驟
1. 設定 Header
2. 先處理有**小計**的欄位：Add Total ➔ Edit Expression ➔ Aggregate ➔ 新增 sum() 計算欄位總和
3. 再處理其他需要**合併儲存格**的欄位：Row Group ➔ Parent Group ➔ Group by ➔ 選擇欄位 ➔ 合併儲存格部分會出現灰色  `[`

![boldreports report designer for stock api.png](http://192.168.25.60:8000/files/file_storage/e2bf3948.png)

### 報表預覽

![boldreports report designer stock report.png](http://192.168.25.60:8000/files/file_storage/0de22b4e.png)

## 憑證類報表
> 主要使用 table：
> - 公司表( company )
> - 產品表( product )
> - 副產品表( byproduct )
> - 憑證表( certificate )
> - 憑證明細表( certificate_detail )

### data sql
```sql
-- product
INSERT INTO "main"."product" ("product_id", "product_name", "unit", "unit_price") VALUES ('00000001', '維士比液 600cc', '箱', '740.0');
INSERT INTO "main"."product" ("product_id", "product_name", "unit", "unit_price") VALUES ('00000002', '維士比液 300cc', '箱', '790.0');
INSERT INTO "main"."product" ("product_id", "product_name", "unit", "unit_price") VALUES ('00000003', '古道梅子綠茶 1500ml', '箱', '303.543');
INSERT INTO "main"."product" ("product_id", "product_name", "unit", "unit_price") VALUES ('00000004', '古道百香綠茶 550ml', '箱', '365.2');

-- byproduct
INSERT INTO "main"."byproduct" ("byproduct_id", "byproduct_name", "unit", "unit_price") VALUES ('00000001', '附維士比液 600cc', '箱', '740.0');
INSERT INTO "main"."byproduct" ("byproduct_id", "byproduct_name", "unit", "unit_price") VALUES ('00000002', '附維士比液 300cc', '箱', '790.0');
INSERT INTO "main"."byproduct" ("byproduct_id", "byproduct_name", "unit", "unit_price") VALUES ('00000003', '附古道梅子綠茶 1500ml', '箱', '303.543');
INSERT INTO "main"."byproduct" ("byproduct_id", "byproduct_name", "unit", "unit_price") VALUES ('00000004', '附古道百香綠茶 550ml', '箱', '365.2');

-- company
INSERT INTO "main"."company" ("company_id", "company_name") VALUES ('75031602', '三洋藥品工業股份有限公司');
INSERT INTO "main"."company" ("company_id", "company_name") VALUES ('23336442', '利大企業股份有限公司');
INSERT INTO "main"."company" ("company_id", "company_name") VALUES ('28594545', '華宸德股份有限公司');

-- certificate
INSERT INTO "main"."certificate" ("certificate_id", "datetime", "serial", "serial_detail", "company_id") VALUES ('KH85220983', '2023-01-01 00:00:00', '2382-1120112001', '4', '75031602');
INSERT INTO "main"."certificate" ("certificate_id", "datetime", "serial", "serial_detail", "company_id") VALUES ('HY01456402', '2023-01-02 00:00:00', '2341-1120113010 ', '3', '28594545');
INSERT INTO "main"."certificate" ("certificate_id", "datetime", "serial", "serial_detail", "company_id") VALUES ('KH85220988', '2023-01-05 00:00:00', '2331-1120113008', '1', '23336442');

-- certificate_detail
INSERT INTO "main"."certificate_detail" ("certificate_detail_id", "certificate_id", "product_id", "byproduct_id", "product_quantity", "byproduct_quantity") VALUES ('1', 'KH85220983', '00000003', '00000003', '10', '2');
INSERT INTO "main"."certificate_detail" ("certificate_detail_id", "certificate_id", "product_id", "byproduct_id", "product_quantity", "byproduct_quantity") VALUES ('2', 'KH85220983', '00000004', '00000004', '9', '3');
INSERT INTO "main"."certificate_detail" ("certificate_detail_id", "certificate_id", "product_id", "byproduct_id", "product_quantity", "byproduct_quantity") VALUES ('3', 'HY01456402', '00000001', '00000001', '50', '6');
INSERT INTO "main"."certificate_detail" ("certificate_detail_id", "certificate_id", "product_id", "byproduct_id", "product_quantity", "byproduct_quantity") VALUES ('4', 'KH85220988', '00000002', '', '60', '');
INSERT INTO "main"."certificate_detail" ("certificate_detail_id", "certificate_id", "product_id", "byproduct_id", "product_quantity", "byproduct_quantity") VALUES ('5', 'KH85220983', '00000001', '00000001', '50', '60');

-- _certificateTocertificate_detail
INSERT INTO "main"."_certificateTocertificate_detail" ("A", "B") VALUES ('KH85220983', '1');
INSERT INTO "main"."_certificateTocertificate_detail" ("A", "B") VALUES ('KH85220983', '2');
INSERT INTO "main"."_certificateTocertificate_detail" ("A", "B") VALUES ('HY01456402', '3');
INSERT INTO "main"."_certificateTocertificate_detail" ("A", "B") VALUES ('KH85220988', '4');
INSERT INTO "main"."_certificateTocertificate_detail" ("A", "B") VALUES ('KH85220983', '5');
```

### 新增 Data Source：NEW DATASOURCE ➔ Web API ➔ NEW CONNECTION
- Name： report_api
- URL： http://127.0.0.1:10010/api/public/certificate/findAll
- Method： GET

### 新增 Data Set：NEW DATA ➔ Existing Data Source ➔ Connect DataSource 
- 將左側出現的 api res 拉至右側
- api 資料格式

```json
{
    "code": "00",
    "dateTime": {
        "tw_date": "2023/02/02",
        "tw_time": "16:05:55",
        "tw_day": "(四)"
    },
    "data": [
        {
            "certificate_id": "KH85220983",
            "datetime": "2023-01-01 00:00:00",
            "serial": "2382-1120112001",
            "serial_detail": "4",
            "company_id": "75031602",
            "certificate_detail": [
                {
                    "certificate_detail_id": 1,
                    "certificate_id": "KH85220983",
                    "product_id": "00000003",
                    "byproduct_id": "00000003",
                    "product_quantity": 10,
                    "byproduct_quantity": 2,
                    "product": {
                        "product_id": "00000003",
                        "product_name": "古道梅子綠茶 1500ml",
                        "unit": "箱",
                        "unit_price": 303.543
                    },
                    "byproduct": {
                        "byproduct_id": "00000003",
                        "byproduct_name": "附古道梅子綠茶 1500ml",
                        "unit": "箱",
                        "unit_price": 303.543
                    }
                },
                {
                    "certificate_detail_id": 2,
                    "certificate_id": "KH85220983",
                    "product_id": "00000004",
                    "byproduct_id": "00000004",
                    "product_quantity": 9,
                    "byproduct_quantity": 3,
                    "product": {
                        "product_id": "00000004",
                        "product_name": "古道百香綠茶 550ml",
                        "unit": "箱",
                        "unit_price": 365.2
                    },
                    "byproduct": {
                        "byproduct_id": "00000004",
                        "byproduct_name": "附古道百香綠茶 550ml",

                        "unit_price": 365.2
                    }

                        "unit_price": 740

                        "byproduct_id": "00000001",
                        "byproduct_name": "附維士比液 600cc",
                        "unit": "箱",
                        "unit_price": 740
                    }
                }
            ],
            "company": {
                "company_id": "28594545",
                "company_name": "華宸德股份有限公司"
            },
            "sum_product": 37000,
            "sum_product_charge": 3700,
            "sum_total": 40700,
            "sum_total_chinese": "零零零肆零柒零零"
        },
        {
            "certificate_id": "KH85220988",
            "datetime": "2023-01-05 00:00:00",
            "serial": "2331-1120113008",
            "serial_detail": "1",
            "company_id": "23336442",
            "certificate_detail": [
                {
                    "certificate_detail_id": 4,
                    "certificate_id": "KH85220988",
                    "product_id": "00000002",
                    "byproduct_id": null,
                    "product_quantity": 60,
                    "byproduct_quantity": null,
                    "product": {
                        "product_id": "00000002",
                        "product_name": "維士比液 300cc",
                        "unit": "箱",
                        "unit_price": 790
                    },
                    "byproduct": null
                }
            ],
            "company": {
                "company_id": "23336442",
                "company_name": "利大企業股份有限公司"
            },
            "sum_product": 47400,
            "sum_product_charge": 4740,
            "sum_total": 52140,
            "sum_total_chinese": "零零零伍貳壹肆零"
        }
    ]
}
```
### 報表設計步驟
1. 先處理表單商品細項、附商品細項
2. 再處理**上方合併儲存格**：Row Group ➔ Adjacent Above ➔ Group by ➔ 選擇欄位 ➔ 合併儲存格部分會出現灰色  `[`
3. 再處理**左側最大儲存格**：Row Group ➔ Parent Group ➔ Group by ➔ 選擇欄位 ➔ 合併儲存格部分會出現灰色  `[`
4. 最後處理**合計**欄位：Insert Row ➔ Outside Group - below ➔ 要在上方合併儲存格之外
5. 最後將左側最大的合併儲存格隱藏欄位顯示：Basic Settings ➔ Font ➔ 調整成白色
6. 將所有表格的框限設定為 **none**：Apperance ➔ Border ➔ none

![boldreports report designer for certificate api.png](http://192.168.25.60:8000/files/file_storage/8355fc5f.png)

### 報表預覽

![boldreports report designer certificate report.png](http://192.168.25.60:8000/files/file_storage/e8405514.png)

# 實作 Embedded Report Designer
## 新增一個 html 檔：indexDesigner.html
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>

<html lang="en" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no"
    />
    <title>Initialize Report Designer</title>
    <meta
      name="description"
      content="To create or edit the RDL reports"
    />
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="favicon.ico" />
    <link
      href="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/content/material/bold.reports.all.min.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
    <link
      href="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/content/material/bold.reportdesigner.min.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.6.0/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/external/jsrender.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Gauge -->
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/ej2-base.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/ej2-data.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/ej2-pdf-export.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/ej2-svg-base.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej2-circulargauge.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej2-lineargauge.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej2-maps.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Reports -->
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/bold.reports.common.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/bold.reports.widgets.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/bold.report-designer-widgets.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/bold.report-viewer.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/bold.report-designer.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Data Visulaization -->
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej.bulletgraph.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej.chart.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Codemirror -->
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/codemirror.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/addon/hint/show-hint.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/addon/hint/sql-hint.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/mode/sql/sql.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/mode/vb/vb.min.js"></script>

    <link
      href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/codemirror.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
    <link
      href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/addon/hint/show-hint.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
  </head>

  <body>
    <div class="splash">
      <div class="message">JavaScript Reports</div>
      <div class="loader">
        <div class="bounce1"></div>
        <div class="bounce2"></div>
        <div class="bounce3"></div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <style>
      html {
        height: 100%;
      }

      body {
        height: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        width: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      ej-sample,
      ej-reportdesigner {
        display: block;
        height: inherit;
        width: inherit;
      }

      .splash {
        position: absolute;
        left: 50%;
        top: 50%;
        transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);
      }

      .message {
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 40px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
      }

      .loader {
        margin: auto;
        width: 70px;
        text-align: center;
        position: relative;
      }

      .loader > div {
        width: 18px;
        height: 18px;
        background-color: black;
        border-radius: 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        -webkit-animation: sk-bouncedelay 1.4s infinite ease-in-out
          both;
        animation: sk-bouncedelay 1.4s infinite ease-in-out both;
      }

      .loader .bounce1 {
        -webkit-animation-delay: -0.32s;
        animation-delay: -0.32s;
      }

      .loader .bounce2 {
        -webkit-animation-delay: -0.16s;
        animation-delay: -0.16s;
      }

      @-webkit-keyframes sk-bouncedelay {
        0%,
        80%,
        100% {
          -webkit-transform: scale(0);
        }

        40% {
          -webkit-transform: scale(1);
        }
      }

      @keyframes sk-bouncedelay {
        0%,
        80%,
        100% {
          -webkit-transform: scale(0);
          transform: scale(0);
        }

        40% {
          -webkit-transform: scale(1);
          transform: scale(1);
        }
      }
    </style>
    <div id="designer"></div>
    <script src="indexDesigner.js"></script>
    <script>
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        document.getElementsByClassName('splash')[0].style.display =
          'None';
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
```
## 新增一個 js 檔：indexDesigner.js
```js
$(function () {
  $('#designer').boldReportDesigner({
    serviceUrl:
      'https://demos.boldreports.com/services/api/ReportingAPI',
  });
});
```
## Go live 

# 實作 Embedded Report Viewer
## 新增一個 html 檔：indexViewer.html
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>

<html lang="en" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta
      name="viewport"
      content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no"
    />
    <title>Initialize Report Viewer</title>
    <meta
      name="description"
      content="Sales order detail report preview"
    />
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="favicon.ico" />
    <link
      href="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/content/material/bold.reports.all.min.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
    <link
      href="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/content/material/bold.reportdesigner.min.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />

    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.6.0/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/external/jsrender.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Gauge -->
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/ej2-base.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/ej2-data.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/ej2-pdf-export.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/ej2-svg-base.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej2-circulargauge.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej2-lineargauge.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej2-maps.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Reports -->
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/bold.reports.common.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/bold.reports.widgets.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/common/bold.report-designer-widgets.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/bold.report-viewer.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/bold.report-designer.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Data Visulaization -->
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej.bulletgraph.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.boldreports.com/4.2.52/scripts/data-visualization/ej.chart.min.js"></script>

    <!-- Codemirror -->
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/codemirror.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/addon/hint/show-hint.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/addon/hint/sql-hint.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/mode/sql/sql.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/mode/vb/vb.min.js"></script>

    <link
      href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/codemirror.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
    <link
      href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/codemirror/5.47.0/addon/hint/show-hint.css"
      rel="stylesheet"
    />
  </head>

  <body>
    <div class="splash">
      <div class="message">JavaScript Reports</div>
      <div class="loader">
        <div class="bounce1"></div>
        <div class="bounce2"></div>
        <div class="bounce3"></div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <style>
      html {
        height: 100%;
      }

      body {
        height: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        width: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      ej-sample,
      ej-reportdesigner {
        display: block;
        height: inherit;
        width: inherit;
      }

      .splash {
        position: absolute;
        left: 50%;
        top: 50%;
        transform: translateY(-50%) translateX(-50%);
      }

      .message {
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 40px;
        margin-bottom: 20px;
      }

      .loader {
        margin: auto;
        width: 70px;
        text-align: center;
        position: relative;
      }

      .loader > div {
        width: 18px;
        height: 18px;
        background-color: black;
        border-radius: 100%;
        display: inline-block;
        -webkit-animation: sk-bouncedelay 1.4s infinite ease-in-out
          both;
        animation: sk-bouncedelay 1.4s infinite ease-in-out both;
      }

      .loader .bounce1 {
        -webkit-animation-delay: -0.32s;
        animation-delay: -0.32s;
      }

      .loader .bounce2 {
        -webkit-animation-delay: -0.16s;
        animation-delay: -0.16s;
      }

      @-webkit-keyframes sk-bouncedelay {
        0%,
        80%,
        100% {
          -webkit-transform: scale(0);
        }

        40% {
          -webkit-transform: scale(1);
        }
      }

      @keyframes sk-bouncedelay {
        0%,
        80%,
        100% {
          -webkit-transform: scale(0);
          transform: scale(0);
        }

        40% {
          -webkit-transform: scale(1);
          transform: scale(1);
        }
      }
    </style>
    <div id="viewer"></div>
    <script src="indexViewer.js"></script>
    <script>
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
        document.getElementsByClassName('splash')[0].style.display =
          'None';
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
```
## 新增一個 js 檔：indexViewer.js
```js
$(function () {
  $('#viewer').boldReportViewer({
    reportServiceUrl:
      'https://demos.boldreports.com/services/api/ReportViewer',
    reportPath: '~/Resources/docs/sales-order-detail.rdl',
  });
});
```
## Go live
